quotes.quote: A girl without braids is like a city without bridges.
Worrying is like paying a debt you don't owe.
An anxious heart is like a string that's out of tune.
Anxiety's like a rocking chair. It gives you something to do, but it doesn't get you very far.
A simile is like a pair of eyeglasses, one side sees this, one side sees that, the device brings them together.
The sun rose like a stripper, keeping its glory well covered by cloud till it seemed there'd be no show at all.
A day without sunshine is like, you know, night.
A room without books is like a body without a soul.
Love is like a booger, you pick and pick at it. Then when you get it you wonder how to get rid of it.
Life is like riding a bicycle. To keep your balance, you must keep moving.
People are like music, some speak the truth and others are just noise.
Life is like an onion. You peel it off one layer at a time, and sometimes you weep.
Life is like a box of chocolate. Taste every bit of it, and you will realise, each chocolate has different taste.
Love is like the wind, you can't see it but you can feel it.
A house without books is like a room without windows.
Life is like the river, sometimes it sweeps you gently along and sometimes the rapids come out of nowhere.
Life is like an onion; you peel it off one layer at a time, and sometimes you weep.
Character is like a tree and reputation its shadow. The shadow is what we think it is and the tree is the real thing.
Humans are so much like bubbles. Vivid and pretty to look at, But prick them once and they burst.
A mind is like a parachute. It doesn't work if it is not open.
